EmailTemplate.description: Email notice to object owner for 2016 Live Award Nomination
EmailTemplate.name: Live Customer Award Nomination
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Live Customer Award Nomination Submitted!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Adaptive Live Customer Award Nomination Notice
Your Customer {!CampaignMember.FirstName} {!CampaignMember.LastName} from {!CampaignMember.CompanyOrAccount} has been nominated for an Adaptive Live Customer Award. No action is needed at this time, this is just an FYI.
{!CampaignMember.Link}
Thank You Sonia Torres storres@adaptiveinsights.com 650-422-7335
